pr_title: Add setting to determine if map vote book is displayed

timeline.message:
Add setting to determine if map vote book is displayed

Signed-off-by: Austin Mayes <austin@avicus.net>

Always give the book to the player

Signed-off-by: Austin Mayes <austin@avicus.net>

timeline.bodyText: Should probably leave this line unmodified
timeline.author: Pablete1234

replies.bodyText: Auto-formatter did this, checks won't pass unless it stays (I think)
replies.author: AustinLMayes

replies.bodyText: That's because you forgot about , at the end of the line.
replies.author: TheMolkaPL

timeline.bodyText: Must be vote_book, look on line 58 in this class.
timeline.author: TheMolkaPL
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -36,6 +36,9 @@
 
   SOUNDS_ON("sounds", "on"), // Always play sounds
   SOUNDS_OFF("sounds", "off"), // Never play sounds
+
+  VOTES_ON("vote-book", "on"), // Show the vote book on cycle
+  VOTES_OFF("vote-book", "off"), // Don't show the vote book on cycle

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/src/main/java/tc/oc/pgm/api/setting/SettingValue.java b/src/main/java/tc/oc/pgm/api/setting/SettingValue.java
index 3f0a70b6..649aca43 100644
--- a/src/main/java/tc/oc/pgm/api/setting/SettingValue.java
+++ b/src/main/java/tc/oc/pgm/api/setting/SettingValue.java

@@ -37,8 +37,8 @@ public enum SettingValue {
   SOUNDS_ON("sounds", "on"), // Always play sounds
   SOUNDS_OFF("sounds", "off"), // Never play sounds
 
-  VOTES_ON("vote-book", "on"), // Show the vote book on cycle
-  VOTES_OFF("vote-book", "off"), // Don't show the vote book on cycle
+  VOTES_ON("vote_book", "on"), // Show the vote book on cycle
+  VOTES_OFF("vote_book", "off"), // Don't show the vote book on cycle
   ;
 
   private final String key;

timeline.message:
Fix settings enum

Signed-off-by: Austin Mayes <austin@avicus.net>

timeline.bodyText: I would call them VOTE_BOOK_ON/OFF for consistency.
timeline.author: TheMolkaPL
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -36,6 +36,9 @@
 
   SOUNDS_ON("sounds", "on"), // Always play sounds
   SOUNDS_OFF("sounds", "off"), // Never play sounds
+
+  VOTES_ON("vote_book", "on"), // Show the vote book on cycle
+  VOTES_OFF("vote_book", "off"), // Don't show the vote book on cycle

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/src/main/java/tc/oc/pgm/api/setting/SettingValue.java b/src/main/java/tc/oc/pgm/api/setting/SettingValue.java
index 649aca43..f5419375 100644
--- a/src/main/java/tc/oc/pgm/api/setting/SettingValue.java
+++ b/src/main/java/tc/oc/pgm/api/setting/SettingValue.java

@@ -37,8 +37,8 @@ public enum SettingValue {
   SOUNDS_ON("sounds", "on"), // Always play sounds
   SOUNDS_OFF("sounds", "off"), // Never play sounds
 
-  VOTES_ON("vote_book", "on"), // Show the vote book on cycle
-  VOTES_OFF("vote_book", "off"), // Don't show the vote book on cycle
+  VOTE_ON("vote", "on"), // Show the vote book on cycle
+  VOTE_OFF("vote", "off"), // Don't show the vote book on cycle
   ;
 
   private final String key;

timeline.bodyText: VOTE("vote") -- similar to PICKER, when we have a GUI for settings we'll explain it.
timeline.author: Electroid

replies.bodyText:
I decided to use vote_book since it was a bit more descriptive than just vote. Like toggling the "picker" is a bit more obvious than toggling "vote".
I can still change it if you wish
replies.author: AustinLMayes

replies.bodyText: I've been trying to keep setting keys a single word :)
replies.author: Electroid

timeline.message:
Implement suggestions from PR

Signed-off-by: Austin Mayes <austin@avicus.net>
